name: Extreme Formula Championship 2015 Free
description:
Extreme Formula Championship is amazing 3D formula racing game for everyone. Do you Want to become a Championship, then show your desire to be a Formula Racing Champion.

Features
-HD Quality of Graphics used in the Game.
-There are 5 Different Tracks in the Full Version. Free Version has 1 Track.
-Excitement increases after every second.
-You can play each Track maximum upto 99 Laps.
-To Control the Car you can use Touch Control or Motion Control in the Game.
-Multi-language support in the Game.
-20 Formula Racing Cars available through in-app purchase.
-Fully Tested on iPhone 4,4s,5,5s,6,6 Plus & iPad (All).
-Ratings & Feedback Appreciated.

Note: Upgrade to Full version to Unlock all the Tracks and Remove Ads in the Game.
